name: BubblingPotion
0:
”Alexa open Bubbling Potion”
”Alexa ask Bubbling Potion to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bubbling potion
des:
Designed for fantasy enthusiasts, this skill produces the bubbling and simmering sounds of a potion boiling. It creates an immersive auditory experience, perfect for background ambiance during reading, gaming, or simply to add a magical touch to your surroundings.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Bubbling Potion
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
